name: 8 Undecided Voters
description:
You are the incumbent president of GSAS Academy's PTA. In eight weeks, you are up for re-election...and you are determined to WIN! Unfortunately, you are neck and neck with the awful awful human being that dared to run against you. This late in the election, there are only 8 undecided voters standing between you and another year of power and glory and PTA meetings. It's up to you to get their votes and show your opponent who runs things around here!

Made in 8 hours.

Coded in 2 hours.

Eric Walsh

William Pheloung

Justin Beurgi

Eric Franco

Diana Nagu
